ygData.subject: Re: Plate/Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Money is such a small part of this game it is pathetic.  The only thing you need money for is buy spells and some raw materials.  Most things that can be made
ygData.messageBody:
Money is such a small part of this game it is pathetic. The only thing you
need money for is buy spells and some raw materials. Most things that can
be made with trade skills (particularly blacksmithing) can be found in the
game world on monsters and are way better.

I have done smithing, and I would much rather spend my time out in the world
of norrath fighting evil and gaining off of that, then sitting at the local
forge trying to make an extremely boring fortune.



-----Original Message-----
From: XxKommiexX@... [mailto:XxKommiexX@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 5:32 PM
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Plate/Weapons


From: XxKommiexX@...

I hear that these things are going into the game soon. Will they? If so, any

time on when? A guess... or something. All comments are welcomed. Just want
to find out. Can't wait until this is in, be a very rich person! Plate
tunics
at 400 - 500pp instead of the thousands... very nice. Very rich, very
famous.
:-) Powergamers dream, and that I am. Please don't flame me on that, just
stick to the topic. =) Thanks much.

Danthin, Human Magician, Master Smith (121)
~Veeshan~

P.S. If any of you are on Veeshan, and see someone wanting banded, have them

tell me. Thanks.
